title: Best of The Herd: 11/08/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/08/2019
description:
Colin talks about the Raiders and Jon Gruden creating an identity which so many teams struggle to do. He warns the Browns about firing Freddie Kitchens because nobody who has options will want the Browns job. He thinks the Raiders officially have won the Khalil Mack trade and the media should apologize. Plus, former Notre Dame and NFL QB Brady Quinn talks about Bama vs LSU and what the Chase Young suspension could mean for Ohio State.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
